title: "My Why" Vaccine Testimonials - Baptist Health
description: Baptist Health scheduling page for COVID-19 vaccinations.
cleaned_text: vaccines are carefully evaluated in clinical trials for safety and efficacy. These vaccines offer significant protection against COVID-19. Based on what we know about vaccines for other diseases, experts believe that the COVID-19 vaccine may help you keep from getting seriously ill even if you do get COVID-19. A common question about vaccines is, are the vaccines safe? Yes. The U.S. vaccine safety system ensures that all vaccines are as safe as possible. However, despite this, some are still hesitant to get vaccinated. If you're feeling unsure, read about why our employees chose to be vaccinated, as they answer questions their own experiences. These interviews were conducted in the summer of 2021, prior to organizational decisions regarding employee vaccination status and booster recommendations. - By Benjamin Klausing, MD Infectious Disease - By Amy Kaiser, Rn - By Angela Sandlin, Pharmacy Director - By Brad Housman, MD - By Brittany Amick, RN Infection Prevention Manager - By Christina Caldwell, RN - By Greg Repass, MD, VP Clinical Support - By Iris Horice, Benefits Coordinator - By Jennifer Baker, Respiratory Therapist - By Katrina Miller, ICU RN - By Marcie Backus, RN - By Rachel Blackman, Occupational Therapist
